title: Schema for Modeling Hub model metadata
description: This is the schema for model metadata files, please refer to https://github.com/covid19-forecast-hub-europe/covid19-forecast-hub-europe/wiki/Metadata for more information.

team_name.description: The name of the team submitting the model

team_abbr.description: Abbreviated name of the team submitting the model

model_version.description: Identifier of the version of the model

website_url.description: Public facing website for the model

repo_url.description: Repository containing code for the model

license.description: License for use of model output data

include_viz.description: Indicator for whether the model should be included in the Hub’s visualization

include_ensemble.description: Indicator for whether the model should be included in the Hub’s ensemble

include_eval.description: Indicator for whether the model should be scored for inclusion in the Hub’s evaluations

citation.description: One or more citations for this model
citation.examples: Gibson GC , Reich NG , Sheldon D. Real-time mechanistic bayesian forecasts of Covid-19 mortality. medRxiv. 2020. https://doi.org/10.1101/2020.12.22.20248736

team_funding.description: Any information about funding source for the team or members of the team.
team_funding.examples: National Institutes of General Medical Sciences (R01GM123456). The content is solely the responsibility of the authors and does not necessarily represent the official views of NIGMS.

data_inputs.description: List or description of data inputs used by the model

methods.description: A brief (200 char.) description of the methods used by this model

methods_long.description: A full description of the methods used by this model.

ensemble_of_hub_models.description: Indicator for whether this model is an ensemble of other Hub models
